name: SmartPopNavigationController
summary: UINavigation controller that could perform several immediate pops/pushes without breaking stuff
description:
UINavigation controller that could perform several pops/pushes without breaking

                   * When several pops are scheduled, this controller will perform only needed ones, call needed callbacks and won't break the navigation sequence
                   * Set class for all navigation controllers to SmartPopNavigationController and it will perform pops safely
